django

Remove GRUB startup menu:
Remove GRUB startup menu
linux

sudo vim /etc/default/grub
Then set GRUB_TIMEOUT to 0

linux

Chroot into broken system:
Chroot into broken system
linux

Get live arch usb, boot into it, then run:

mkdir mnt
mount /dev/sdaXY mnt

/dev/sdaXY is the main OS partition, you can find it by running fdisk -l
Android Debug Bridge (ADB) to remove And:
Android Debug Bridge (ADB) to remove Android bloatware
linux

adb devices
adb shell

pm list packages
pm list packages -d
pm list packages -e
pm list packages | grep "google"

pm disable-user com.google.bloatware
adb uninstall com.google.bloatware
Delete all files in .gitignore from remo:
Delete all files in .gitignore from remote
git

git rm --cached `git ls-files -i -c --exclude-from=.gitignore`
Python Telegram Bot:
Python Telegram Bot
python

from telegram.ext import Application, MessageHandler, CommandHandler
from telegram.ext.filters import TEXT

async def get_chat_id(update, context):
    chat_id = update.message.chat_id
    print(f"User's chat ID: {chat_id}")
    await update.message.reply_text(f"Your chat ID is {chat_id}")

if __name__ == "__main__":
    TOKEN = "YOUR_BOT_TOKEN"
    
    # Create the application
    application = Application.builder().token(TOKEN).build()

    # Register the handler for text messages
    application.add_handler(MessageHandler(TEXT, get_chat_id))

    # Start polling
    print("Bot is running. Send a message to it to get the chat ID.")
    application.run_polling()

Convert png to jpg using ffmpeg:
Convert png to jpg using ffmpeg
linux

To convert a single file
ffmpeg -i file.png new_file.jpg

To convert all files in dir
for file in *.png; do ffmpeg -i "$file" "${file%.*}.jpg"; done
Convert text after tesseract:
Convert text after tesseract
Utils

text = """
Особое внимание мы уделяем обслуживанию.
Наша команда профессионалов всегда готова
помочь вам с выбором блюд, порекомендовать
идеальный напиток и создать ту самую атмосфе-
ру, которую вы захотите запомнить.
"""

strings = text.split('\n')
result = ''
for i in strings:
    if len(i) > 0:
        if i[-1] == '-':
            i = i[0:-2]
        elif i[-1] == '.':
            i += ' '
    result += i

print(result)
